heading: Visitors during COVID-19
details: Currently, no visitors are allowed to any Royal Melbourne Hospital sites (updated 11 October 2021).

heading: Screening clinic and results
details: Our COVID-19 screening clinic at 300 Grattan St will close on Monday 27 September 2021. Find out where to get tested.

heading: COVID-19 vaccination program
details: The Royal Melbourne Hospital is operating one of Victoriaâ€™s high-volume COVID-19 Vaccination Centres, located at the Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre.

heading: Outpatients appointments and Telehealth
details: As part of our response to COVID-19 we have made some changes to our outpatient appointments. This includes advice about people who are currently in quarantine and still require medical care including outpatient and imaging appointments.

heading: Frequently asked questions about COVID-19
details: We have compiled a number of answers about what COVID-19 is, visiting the hospital and how to reduce the spread within the community.

heading: Screening for COVID-19 before your surgery or procedure
details: Under the current Department of Health guidelines, all patients require COVID-19 screening 72 hours before elective surgery and some procedures. This will help ensure staff have the right protocols in place to care for you safely.

heading: COVID-19 information in community languages
details: View our COVID-19 informative videos in multiple languages.

heading: Wearing a mask
details: Our video guide to wearing masks - how to put them on and take them off properly.
